songs.title: Dreamer (Bibi Bourelly Version)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Eh-Eh-Eh-Eh-XCX

[Chorus: Charli XCX]
I'm a dreamer
Step, step out the Beemer
'Bout to do it big
Stretch, stretch limousine-uh
I'm a dreamer
Step, step out the Beemer
Angel in the clouds rain down, best believe it
I'm a dreamer
Step, step out the Beemer
'Bout to do it big
Stretch, stretch limousine-uh
I'm a dreamer
Step, step out the Beemer
Angel in the clouds rain down, yeah, yeah

[Verse 1: Bibi Bourelly]
I cut my EP in a closet
I ain't no pop bitch, I'm an artist
The Lord telling me be more modest, young one:
"Stay on your toes, you've got lessons to come"
Lurk, don't get caught on the highway
Made on my way, too many snakes
Beat up on my seas on a-game
I don't do nothing, no man say
Look
My girls in the cut
Smoking they curls
Big dream and the goods
My squad keep grinding for us
In the cut
Smoking they curls
Big dream and the goods
My squad is grinding for us

[Chorus: Charli XCX & Bibi Bourelly]
I'm a dreamer
Step, step out the Beemer
'Bout to do it big
Stretch, stretch limousine-uh
I'm a dreamer
Step, step out the Beemer
Angel in the clouds rain down, best believe it
I'm a dreamer
Step, step out the Beemer
'Bout to do it big
Stretch, stretch limousine-uh
I'm a dreamer
Step, step out the Beemer
Angel in the clouds rain down, yeah

[Bridge: Charli XCX]
Yeah, I'm an angel in the atmosphere
Up in the penthouse, come and say my name
But sometimes I just wanna disappear
So then I spread my wings and fly away
Yeah, I'm an angel in the atmosphere
Up in the penthouse, come and say my name
But sometimes I just wanna disappear
So then I spread my wings and fly
(Fly, fl-fl-fly, fly)

[Chorus: Charli XCX & Bibi Bourelly]
I'm a dreamer
Step, step out the Beemer
'Bout to do it big
Stretch, stretch limousine-uh
I'm a dreamer
Step, step out the Beemer
Angel in the clouds rain down, best believe it
I'm a dreamer
Step, step out the Beemer
'Bout to do it big
Stretch, stretch limousine-uh
I'm a dreamer
Step, step out the Beemer
Angel in the clouds rain down, yeah

[Outro: Charli XCX]
Dreamer, dreamer
Beemer, Beemer
Dreamer, dreamer, dreamer
Beemer, Beemer, yeah
Dreamer, dreamer
Beemer, Beemer
Dreamer, dreamer, dreamer
Beemer, Beemer
